title: Trump says he's 'pardoned' a Colorado clerk convicted of election tampering. Can he?
description: President Trump says he's pardoning a former Colorado county clerk who was convicted of tampering with voting equipment to prove false voter fraud claims. But his powers don't extend to state crimes.
content: President Trump says he's pardoning a former Colorado county clerk who was convicted of tampering with voting equipment to prove false voter fraud claims. But his powers don't extend to state crimes.
